name: Swartley et al., Appellants, v. Baird

judges: Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearns.
parties: Swartley et al., Appellants, v. Baird

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The facts and the law are fully stated in the opinion of President Judge Smith and Judge Alessandroni and upon that opinion the order of the court below will be affirmed.
Order affirmed at appellants’ cost.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: George W. Keitel, Deputy Attorney General, with him John E.- Stevenson, Special Deputy Attorney General, James H. Duff, Attorney General, and Maxwell E. Yerlin, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Swartley et al., Appellants, v. Baird
Argued May 10, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearns.
Harry Shapiro, for appellants.
George W. Keitel, Deputy Attorney General, with him John E.- Stevenson, Special Deputy Attorney General, James H. Duff, Attorney General, and Maxwell E. Yerlin, for appellee.
June 30, 1943:
